participant_1.background:
I think my family would be disappointed, but they would still love me.
I had a long career as an educator and mentor, but now I am retired and enjoying my golden years.
i never knew my dad.
My favorite book is The Little Prince because it reminds me of my dog.
i am a rapper.

participant_2.background:
I used to want to serve my country, but now I'm happily employed at a bank.
i like to cook.
i can never decide between a chili corn dog and a cheesy hot dog.
i like to do crafts.
i enjoy electronic music.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I am doing very well. I am a retired educator and mentor. I used to be a rapper.
That is really cool! I used to want to serve my country, but now I am happily employed at a bank.
I am glad you found a career that you enjoy.
I do, thank you. I enjoy cooking, crafts, and electronic music.
I like to cook as well. My favorite book is The Little Prince because it reminds me of my dog.
That is a very interesting book. I have not read it. I will have to check it out.
I highly recommend it. It is a classic. I am glad to hear that you enjoy cooking.
Thank you. I like to cook for my family and friends.
That is very kind of you. I am sure they appreciate it.
They do. I am glad that I have a job that I enjoy.
I am glad as well. It is important to have a job that you enjoy.
I agree. I am happy with my life.
That is great to hear. I am happy for you.
